TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ProvidersHelper extends System.Object
public ref class ProvidersHelper abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Provides methods for creating provider instances, either singly or in a batch.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase InstantiateProvider (System.Configuration.ProviderSettings providerSettings, Type providerType);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase InstantiateProvider(class System.Configuration.ProviderSettings providerSettings, class System.Type providerType) cil managed

Docs.param: The settings to be passed to the provider upon initialization.
The of the provider to be initialized.
Docs.summary: Initializes and returns a single provider of the given type using the supplied settings.
Docs.returns: A new provider of the given type using the supplied settings.
Docs.exception:
The provider type defined in configuration was or an empty string ("").
-or-
The provider type defined in configuration is not compatible with the type used by the feature that is attempting to create a new instance of the provider.

The provider threw an exception while it was being initialized.
-or-
An error occurred while attempting to resolve a instance for the provider specified in .

MemberSignature.Value: public static void InstantiateProviders (System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection configProviders, System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection providers, Type providerType);

.method public static hidebysig void InstantiateProviders(class System.Configuration.ProviderSettingsCollection configProviders, class System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection providers, class System.Type providerType) cil managed
Public Shared Sub InstantiateProviders (configProviders As ProviderSettingsCollection, providers As ProviderCollection, providerType As Type)
public: static void InstantiateProviders(System::Configuration::ProviderSettingsCollection ^ configProviders, System::Configuration::Provider::ProviderCollection ^ providers, Type ^ providerType);

Docs.param: A collection of settings to be passed to the provider upon initialization.
The collection used to contain the initialized providers after the method returns.
The of the providers to be initialized.
Docs.summary: Initializes a collection of providers of the given type using the supplied settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method calls the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProvidersHelper.InstantiateProvider%2A> method, and any exceptions thrown by that method will bubble up through the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProvidersHelper.InstantiateProviders%2A> method.
